resources.string:
Hello! 
This is the main menu of our application from here you can use buttons to: 
Select photo from gallery for image recognition 
Take a new photo using phone camera for image recognition 
Switch between different ML models to select one to use 
Load new models from phone storage to use
Here You can take a photo and the application will run it through currently use Machine Learning model and then display five classes which the model will predict as the most probable

Here You can load new models to use. If You wan to load model that is complainant with our default settings (224x224 input size model recognizing labels from a dataset of 285 plant species from Tatra National Park) just click Load Model and select appropriate .tflite file. However if You want to load model that differs from our default (has different size of input, recognizes cars, animals etc.) You need to provide a manifest file (a simple json) that describes the the models input and output. To do so uncheck the "Use default manifest" and load a custom one, then chose a .tflite file containing model described in the manifest.

Here You can select a model to use (from the ones we provided or those that You have loaded yourself). Model You select is gone be run whenever You take a photo with the camera or pick one from gallery.
